item.description:
Call me when you get there when they direct you to where the line is. I'll be in the very front of the line or in the middle, therefor I'll waive my hand and you can come stand where I am waiting to get in depending if nobody from the line argues about you coming to the front but I have done this lots of times with friends and guests.

FROST/NIXON - Trailer

If you do not have a printer and would like me to make a copy for you. I can meet you somewhere before this Advance Screening and give you a copy of it.



Windsor - cell: 617-435-8177 don't hesitate to call me for anything.


The passes are located on the left side of this page. Look for "Files" and enter " Files" , then select Frost/Nixon Advance Screening and print out a pass for yourself or how many.




Thank You
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting in the line and hopefull infront or in the middle
item.name: Frost/Nixon - ADVANCE SCREENING
